Package controlP5

Class Label

java.lang.Object
controlP5.Label
All Implemented Interfaces:
CDrawable
public class Label
extends java.lang.Object
implements CDrawable
A custom label using controlP5's BitFonts or PFont based ControlFonts.
See Also:
ControlFont
